means: 荜澄茄，<美>含有荜澄茄粉的药用香烟（用于治疗粘膜炎）

word_mean: 荜澄茄：产于南亚的荜澄茄(Piper cubeba L.f.，Piperaceae)将近长成但未成熟之干果实，含10～18％挥发油、荜澄茄素、树脂、脂肪和蜡。以往用于促使粘膜愈合，用作利尿药和尿路消毒药

PerfectNetExp.abs: cube sugar 方糖cubeb 荜澄茄cuber 压块机
种叫非洲豆蔻(aframomummelegueta)的香料代替黑椒,在法国北部尤其常见,此外,长椒(Piperlongum)、肉豆蔻种子中的核仁(nutmeg)、甘松香、高良姜、荜澄茄(cubeb)也.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French cubebe, from Spanish Arabic kubēba, from Arabic kubāba

means.word_mean: 1. spicy fruit of the cubeb vine; when dried and crushed is used medicinally or in perfumery and sometimes smoked in cigarettes
2. tropical southeast Asian shrubby vine bearing spicy berrylike fruits
